### MODERNISATION DE LA CHAMBRE FORTE DESTINÉE À L’ENTREPOSAGE DES ARMES
================================inheritdoc

**Organization**: Department of National Defence

**Project Title**: Vault Upgrades - Aldershot

**Procurement Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Bid Solicitation Number**: W0501-23C016/A

**Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

**Proposal Submission Guidelines**
------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence invites interested bidders to submit proposals to upgrade four (4) vaults for the secure storage of arms at Det Aldershot, Nova Scotia. Proposals must be submitted electronically through CPC Connect, in accordance with the instructions outlined in the bid solicitation document.

**Procurement Overview**

- **Requirement**: The successful bidder will be required to supply and install one weapons rack for each of the four (4) vaults.
- **Technical Evaluation Criteria**: Bidders are expected to meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria, as outlined in the bid solicitation document.
- **Method of Payment**: The Crown retains the right to pay the successful bidder in Canadian dollars.
- **Deliverable**: All deliverables must be received by no later than March 31, 2023.

**Process for Response**
-------------------------

Bidders are reminded to carefully review the bid solicitation document, including the technical specifications and evaluation criteria, before submitting their proposals. Proposals must be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Security Considerations**
---------------------------

Security considerations are not applicable to this project.

**Support for Small and Medium Enterprises**
------------------------------------------

The Department of National Defence encourages small and medium enterprises (SMEs) to participate in this project.

**Requests for Information**
---------------------------

Interested bidders are requested to submit written questions related to the project to the Contracting Authority:

Matthew Furlong
Email: matthew.furlong@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
Fax: (902) 495-5016
Telephone: (902) 225-2851

All requests for information must be received by the Contracting Authority no later than five (5) calendar days before the closing date.

**Award Criteria**
------------------

The award criteria for this project will be based on the lowest evaluated price. Additional information regarding the award criteria can be found in the bid solicitation document.
